title: That the Council minutes of April 8, 2024, be approved.

That Report of Closed Session – Property Acquisition, Report of Closed Session – Agreement, 2023 Investment Report, Report FCSFS24-007, Contract Amendment for Consulting Services to support the Peterborough Organics Facility Project, Report MOENV24-002, Update regarding Little Lake Fireworks Platform, Report MOENV24-010, Request for Reinstatement of Draft Plans of Subdivision 15T- 10504 and 15T-05503, 4571 Guthrie Drive, 2006 and 2011 McNamara Road, Report IPGPL24-010 and Canada Day Celebrations, Report CSRS24-006 be approved on Consent.
R.5-365 – Residential District in accordance with the Draft Zoning By-law Amendment attached as Exhibit D of Report IPGPL24-007.
for: Councillor Vassiliadis Conflict (1): Councillor Duguay Absent (1): Councillor Haacke

title: accordance with the provisions of the Planning Act, R.S.O 1990 c.P.13 and the City’s Parkland Dedication By-law; v. Pedestrian connections to the nearest transit stop are fully investigated and arranged, to the satisfaction of Transportation Engineering Staff; vi. A Road widening is conveyed to the City of Peterborough along the Sherbrooke Street Frontage as prescribed in “I”: Road Allowance Widths of the Official Plan; and vii. 1-foot reserves are established along open sides of road frontage to the satisfaction of the City Engineer.
for: Councillor Vassiliadis Conflict (1): Councillor Duguay Absent (1): Councillor Haacke

title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report IPGPL24-005, dated April 22, 2024 of the Commissioner, Infrastructure, Planning and Growth Management (Acting) as follows: That Report IPGPL24-005 be received for information.

AND FURTHER THAT this resolution be circulated to the President of AMO, Colin Best, Premier Doug Ford, the Minister of Energy, Todd Smith, The Minister of Finance, Peter Bethlenfalvy and all regional municipalities requesting support of the proposed changes.
against: Councillor Vassiliadis Conflict (1): Councillor Parnell Absent (1): Councillor Haacke

title: That by-law 24-026 Being a By-law to amend the Zoning By-law for the lands known as 1113 Clonsilla Avenue, be approved. That by-law 24-027, Being a By-law to amend the Zoning By-law for the lands known as 1509, 1529 and 1533 Sherbrooke Street, be approved.
for: Councillor Vassiliadis Conflict (1): Councillor Duguay Absent (1): Councillor Haacke

title: That this meeting be adjourned at 7:16 p.m.
